events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue was classified under Refund due to the customer's request for money back on a wrong item.
Assigned support agent Jessica to handle the refund request for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund for the incorrect order.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can start the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I have attached a photo showing the item I got instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the info. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a return label to send the wrong item back.
That sounds great, thank you for your quick response and for resolving this matter promptly.
The refund has been processed and return instructions sent. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to ensure you received your refund and that everything was handled to your satisfaction.
Since no further issues were reported, we have now closed your refund case. Thank you for your patience.
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey related to your recent refund experience.
